itunes:title: Episode 519 - DB Sports Companion Show 12/10/19 - College Football Playoffs Special
title: Episode 519 - DB Sports Companion Show 12/10/19 - College Football Playoffs Special
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the final College Football Playoff rankings, why Ohio State got a bad draw and how Clemson can win it all, who will win the Heisman trophy this weekend in the biggest no brainer of all time, why we hope the Saints/...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the final College Football Playoff rankings, why Ohio State got a bad draw and how Clemson can win it all, who will win the Heisman trophy this weekend in the biggest no brainer of all time, why we hope the Saints/49ers game is a precursor for the NFC Championship, who wins the main events this weekend in UFC 245, this week's NFL picks, and as always we take questions from the listeners.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the final College Football Playoff rankings, why Ohio State got a bad draw and how Clemson can win it all, who will win the Heisman trophy this weekend in the biggest no brainer of all time, why we hope the Saints/49ers game is a precursor for the NFC Championship, who wins the main events this weekend in UFC 245, this week's NFL picks, and as always we take questions from the listeners.
